messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR GAVIN BROWN
messages.content: A track record of delivery; A new local champion; More common sense policies in the Scottish Parliament

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gavin wants to see health spending protected, greater action on creating jobs in Edinburgh Southern, the ending of automatic early release for violent criminals and a Council Tax discount for pensioner households.

issues.economy: Greater action on creating jobs in Edinburgh Southern.
issues.governance: Ending of automatic early release for violent criminals.
issues.socialWelfare: Council Tax discount for pensioner households.

housing.content: Campaigned to save the green belt, fought against inappropriately located projects, dealt with housing issues and action on street pavement repairs and dealt with housing more antisocial behaviour.

politicalExperience.achievements: Track record of delivering 1,000 extra police officers, Council Tax freeze, Town Centre Regeneration Fund and the abolition of business rates for thousands of small businesses.
